The election of a dog as mayor of Rabbit: Kentucky was reported by multiple news outlets in June 2017. This indicates that there was media coverage and public awareness of the claim.
The elected dog: Brynn (also known as Brynneth Pawltro), is described as an "unofficial" mayor with no actual mayoral powers. This suggests that the position is more symbolic than functional.
The election of nonhuman mascots as mayo: This historical context supports the claim that a dog was elected as mayor.
The election of the first mayor: Goofy Borneman, was held as a fundraising event to restore a church in Rabbit Hash. The fact that the election was organized by the Rabbit Hash Historical Society and involved charging a dollar to vote further supports the authenticity of the claim.
